      Get the created instance of the specified class
      static void inject(java.lang.Class<?>... classes)
      Create an instance of all specified classes For each field of these classes if there exists an object for it write it into that field This way the implementations for the classes field mustn't be provided manually but are instead automatically resolved across the entire application

      Take an instance and iterate over its fields injecting available instances on the way

      • getInstance

        public static <T> T getInstance(java.lang.Class<? super T> clazz)
        Get the created instance of the specified class
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of class to get instance of
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class object for passing the type T
        Returns:
        The instance

      • inject

        public static void inject(java.lang.Class<?>... classes)
        Create an instance of all specified classes For each field of these classes if there exists an object for it write it into that field This way the implementations for the classes field mustn't be provided manually but are instead automatically resolved across the entire application
        Parameters:
        classes - The classes to create and inject into

      • injectAllFields

        private static void injectAllFields(java.lang.Object instance)
        Take an instance and iterate over its fields injecting available instances on the way
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance to inject into

      • tryInjectField

        private static void tryInjectField(java.lang.Object instance,
                                   java.lang.reflect.Field field)
        Checks if the provided field is injectable If it is inject the fitting instance into the field of the provided instance
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance to inject into
        field - The field to inject into if possible

      • getInjectable

        private static java.util.Optional<java.lang.Class<?>> getInjectable(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                                                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> injectables)
        Get the correct injectable instance for a given field
        Parameters:
        type - Type of injectable to search for
        injectables - The classes that are available to inject
        Returns:
        correct injectable instance or Optional.empty() if none or multiple exist

      • createInstance

        private static <T> T createInstance(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Creates an instance of the given class

        If a factory method named 'getInstance' is available this method is used for creation Else a parameterless constructor is expected to exist

        Type Parameters:
        T - The class type
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to create
        Returns:
        An instance of the given class
